note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the groups designating sewing apparatus or machines cover also sewing processes dependent on their use, and the thread seams produced thereby

note.note-paragraph: Group D05B19/003 is no longer used for classification of new documents. The backlog of this group is being continuosly reclassified to groups D05B19/02 to D05B19/16
